00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Interface to the on chip key memory. Key memory is
00044  * 8k on chip that is inaccessible from off chip. It can
00045  * also be cleared using an external hardware pin.
00046  *
00047  * <hr>$Revision: 73845 $<hr>
00048  *
00049  */
00050 
00051 #ifndef __CVMX_KEY_H__
00052 #define __CVMX_KEY_H__
00053 
00054 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00055 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00056 extern "C" {
00057 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 #define CVMX_KEY_MEM_SIZE 8192  /* Size in bytes */
00061 
00062 /**
00063  * Read from KEY memory
00064  *
00065  * @param address Address (byte) in key memory to read
00066  *                0 <= address < CVMX_KEY_MEM_SIZE
00067  * @return Value from key memory
00068  */
00069 static inline uint64_t cvmx_key_read(uint64_t address)
00070 {
00071     cvmx_addr_t ptr;
00072 
00073     ptr.u64 = 0;
00074     ptr.sio.mem_region = CVMX_IO_SEG;
00075     ptr.sio.is_io = 1;
00076     ptr.sio.did = CVMX_OCT_DID_KEY_RW;
00077     ptr.sio.offset = address;
00078 
00079     return cvmx_read_csr(ptr.u64);
00080 }
00081 
00082 /**
00083  * Write to KEY memory
00084  *
00085  * @param address Address (byte) in key memory to write
00086  *                0 <= address < CVMX_KEY_MEM_SIZE
00087  * @param value   Value to write to key memory
00088  */ static inline void cvmx_key_write(uint64_t address, uint64_t value)
00089 {
00090     cvmx_addr_t ptr;
00091 
00092     ptr.u64 = 0;
00093     ptr.sio.mem_region = CVMX_IO_SEG;
00094     ptr.sio.is_io = 1;
00095     ptr.sio.did = CVMX_OCT_DID_KEY_RW;
00096     ptr.sio.offset = address;
00097 
00098     cvmx_write_io(ptr.u64, value);
00099 }
00100 
00101 /* CSR typedefs have been moved to cvmx-key-defs.h */
00102 
00103 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00104 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00105 }
00106 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00107 #endif
00108 
00109 #endif /*  __CVMX_KEY_H__ */
